title: 19-year-old injured in shooting in east Baltimore
content:
BALTIMORE —
Detectives are investigating the shooting of a 19-year-old man.
The shooting was reported on Homewood Avenue in east Baltimore.
Police officers located the victim after responding to reports of the shooting around 4:45 p.m. Thursday.
He was transported to an area hospital for his injuries.
Anyone with information is urged to contact police at 410-396-2221.
